desc: Brighton and Hove's best loved Children's shoe shop. We offer measuring and fitting services. We source brands for the best shoes for kids including Start-rite, Geox, Hummel, Bobux, Skechers, Petasil, Froddo, superfit and Ricosta.

layout.text:
Expert help is at hand! Speak to our super friendly team if you need fitting advice before placing your order.
We look forward to welcoming you to shoo zoo - come and see what all the fuss is about!
-Brighton's Best Loved Kids Shoe Shop since 2004-
